They are a popular fashion accessory and can be made from a variety of materials like velvet, plastic, beads, leather, or metal. details.description_text: Unlock your destinyGracing the earliest Greek Gods, the pearl has long been recognized as a divine gift and a universal symbol of a wish waiting to come true. Now you can give someone special their very own freshwater oyster to reveal what their future may hold. The Make a Wish Necklace Kit includes an oyster that is guaranteed to hold an exquisite, cultured pearl; a copper chain and a cage pendant in which to mount their pearl and wear it for all to admire.The secrets in the pearlsEach oyster is hermetically sealed in an aluminum tin, just waiting for the lucky recipient to open it and reveal what her good fortune is to be. Pearls will be in 1 of 5 colors. A white pearl predicts wisdom while a cream-colored pearl foretells success. A peach pearl indicates that she will be blessed with health while the lavender pearl foresees wealth. The coveted black pearl says that love is coming her way. No one will know what prophesy the oyster holds until it is opened.A memorable gift for any occasionEvery oyster is attractively gift-boxed with the story of the Pearl and a reference guide to the meaning of their colors. A fashionable copper neck chain and metal alloy pearl cage pendant are elegantly displayed on a heart-shaped, flocked cushion. Ready to bestow as a Christmas, Valentine's Day or birthday gift for her, the Make a Wish Necklace will be a once-in-a-lifetime experience that she can joyfully relive every time she wears her cage pearl pendant necklace.Discover a great mystery of the sea. Add the Make A Wish Necklace to her pearl jewelry today.

It is called 925 silver because it is 92.5% pure silver. The other 7.5% is another metal (typically copper), which helps strengthen and stabilize the metal.Is pure silver better?For jewelry, 925 silver is far better. Pure silver is also known as fine silver and it is not as good for making jewelry for several reasons:- pure silver is not ductile, meaning it can‚Äôt be easily formed into jewelry or adjusted to fit- pure silver is soft, making it less functional- pure silver will mix with small amounts of hydrogen sulfide in air and will tarnishHow is it stamped?Typically 925 silver will be stamped with a ‚Äú925‚Äù, ‚ÄúS925‚Äù, or ‚ÄúSterling‚Äù marking. Not all 925 silver is marked, so you may need to consult the seller on how the quality and purity is assured. Often, if a silver item is not marked the jewelry may only be electroplated with Silver‚Äîwhich makes its value much lower than 925 silver. Metallurgists or reputable jewelry dealers may be able to confirm the purity of the silver by measuring or by applying chemical tests to the metal. Purity test kits for silver can also be purchased and tested at home.What is 925 silver for jewelry?Simply put, it is the purest form of silver for making jewelry that maintains its beauty over time. Because it is a stable alloy, it will not tarnish over time. It is more workable by jewelry adjusters. 925 silver will not bleed or shed onto your skin when you wear it.ORSA 925 sterling silverjewels use genuine 92.5% silver and top quality AAA+ CZ.Solid silver inside with Rhodium or 18K rose gold plated on surface, absolute safe for human body.Your orders will be shipped out within 48 hours after payment. Ready to bestow as a Christmas, Valentine's Day or birthday gift for her, the Make a Wish Necklace will be a once-in-a-lifetime experience that she can joyfully relive every time she wears her cage pearl pendant necklace.Discover a great mystery of the sea. 543945765.name: Love Pearl Kit with Pendant Necklace (Heart/Butterfly Design)

details.description_text: Love Pearl Kit with Pendant Necklace (Heart/Butterfly Design)Product details of Love Pearl Kit with Pendant Necklace (Heart/Butterfly Design)This product is a **"Love Pearl" or "Wish Pearl" kit**, offering a unique and interactive experience. Here's a detailed description:**Product Description:**The Love Pearl Kit provides a magical and personalized jewelry-making experience, making it an ideal gift for special occasions like birthdays, anniversaries, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, or just to show affection.Each kit comes beautifully packaged in a decorative box, often featuring elegant designs such as butterflies or hearts, as seen in the image. Inside, you'll find:* **A Sealed Can Containing an Oyster:** The core of the experience, this can holds a real, preserved oyster (or sometimes a simulated pearl in foam) in a special liquid solution designed to mimic its natural environment.* **A Unique Pearl:** The highlight is the mystery of discovering your own genuine freshwater pearl hidden within the oyster. Pearls typically range in size (e.g., 5-8mm) and come in various natural colors, each often symbolizing a different meaning (e.g., white for health, cream for happiness, peach for love, lavender for wisdom, gold for wealth). The color of the pearl is a surprise until the oyster is opened.* **A Pendant Necklace:** The kit includes a stylish necklace, usually with a silver-plated chain (often 17-18 inches) and a "cage" style pendant. The pendant is designed to securely hold the pearl, allowing its beauty to be showcased while protecting it. The pendant design in this specific kit appears to be a heart-shaped cage, complementing the romantic theme.* **Instructions:** Simple steps are included to guide the user through the process: making a wish, carefully opening the oyster, retrieving the pearl, and placing it into the pendant to wear.* **Educational Booklet (Optional):** Some kits may include a booklet explaining the symbolism of pearl colors and the lore surrounding pearls.**Key Features:*** **DIY Experience:** Offers an exciting and engaging hands-on activity, allowing the recipient to "harvest" their own pearl.* **Surprise Element:** The thrill of not knowing the pearl's color and discovering it adds to the uniqueness and excitement of the gift.* **Meaningful Gift:** Each pearl color is associated with a specific meaning, adding a thoughtful and personal touch to the present.* **Elegant Design:** The necklace and packaging are designed to be aesthetically pleasing and suitable for various occasions.* **High Appeal:** A popular choice for those seeking a novel and memorable gift.This Love Pearl Kit offers not just a piece of jewelry, but an unforgettable experience and a cherished keepsake.
